import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";import boxShadows from"assets/theme/base/boxShadows";// Vision UI Dashboard PRO React Helper Functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var white=colors.white,text=colors.text,info=colors.info,secondary=colors.secondary;var size=typography.size;var buttonBoxShadow=boxShadows.buttonBoxShadow;export default{base:{backgroundColor:white.main,minHeight:pxToRem(40),color:text.main,boxShadow:buttonBoxShadow.main,padding:"".concat(pxToRem(12)," ").concat(pxToRem(24)),"&:hover":{backgroundColor:white.main,boxShadow:buttonBoxShadow.stateOf},"&:focus":{boxShadow:buttonBoxShadow.stateOf},"&:active, &:active:focus, &:active:hover":{opacity:0.85,boxShadow:buttonBoxShadow.stateOf},"&:disabled":{boxShadow:buttonBoxShadow.main},"& .material-icon, .material-icons-round, svg":{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(16)," !important")}},small:{minHeight:pxToRem(32),padding:"".concat(pxToRem(8)," ").concat(pxToRem(32)),fontSize:size.xxs,"& .material-icon, .material-icons-round, svg":{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(12)," !important")}},large:{minHeight:pxToRem(47),padding:"".concat(pxToRem(14)," ").concat(pxToRem(64)),fontSize:size.xxs,"& .material-icon, .material-icons-round, svg":{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(22)," !important")}},primary:{backgroundColor:info.main,"&:hover":{backgroundColor:info.main},"&:focus:not(:hover)":{backgroundColor:info.focus,boxShadow:buttonBoxShadow.stateOfNotHover}},secondary:{backgroundColor:secondary.main,"&:hover":{backgroundColor:secondary.main},"&:focus:not(:hover)":{backgroundColor:secondary.focus,boxShadow:buttonBoxShadow.stateOfNotHover}}};
